other_tests.procedure_name: Electrodiagnostic and nerve conduction velocity studies
other_tests.findings: Severe ulnar neuropathy at or around the right elbow.

other_tests.procedure_name: Open contracture release with ulnar nerve exploration
other_tests.findings: Ulnar nerve was transposed anteriorly; a neuroma was present at the proximal stump; the nerve was completely transected with a 4.5-cm defect between the proximal and distal stumps.
